welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oldham, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, rich industrial history, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this lovely city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The terminal for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
